price: Na hakika tulimwonyesha ishara zetu zote. Lakini alikadhibisha na akakataa.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرَيۡنَٰهُ ءَايَٰتِنَا كُلَّهَا فَكَذَّبَ وَأَبَىٰ

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walaqad araynāhu āyātinā kullahā fakadhaba wa-abā
